title: A skin patch to treat peanut allergies? Study in toddlers shows promise
description: A new study finds an experimental skin patch shows promise to treat toddlers who are highly allergic to peanuts

title: WATCH:  After three years apart, daughter and dad reunite at the airport
description: Amy Loynton wasn’t able to see her dad after moving to New Zealand, and the COVID-19 pandemic prevented her from traveling.

title: WATCH:  Woman goes viral for filming ex-husband's proposal to girlfriend
description: "She is the kind of woman I have prayed would come into his life," Leah Bourdo wrote in her TikTok video.

title: Mommy blogger known as 'Dooce' dies by suicide at 47
description: Heather Armstrong was one of the first bloggers to document motherhood with her website Dooce.com.

title: Indiana sheriff's deputy killed in dog attack that left her son, 8, wounded
description: Authorities say a sheriff’s deputy died after being attacked in her Indianapolis home by a dog that also bit and wounded her 8-year-old son

title: George Santos has been criminally charged. Here's what prosecutors say he did.
description: Rep. George Santos has been indicted on 13 counts related to COVID unemployment aid, lying to the House of Representatives and a scheme to receive campaign donations.

title: NYC mayor condemns chokehold death: 'Jordan Neely did not deserve to die'
description: NYC Mayor Eric Adams condemned the death of Jordan Neely, who died after a subway passenger was captured on video holding him in a chokehold, in remarks on Wednesday.

title: South Carolina man sues police after being shot at 47 times during mental crisis
description: A man is suing a sheriff’s office in South Carolina, saying deputies shot at him about 50 times when he was having a mental health crisis with a shotgun in his lap even though his hands were raised

title: FDA advisors vote in favor of allowing 1st over-the-counter birth control pill
description: Advisory committees of the Food and Drug Administration are meeting this week to decide whether or not to recommend approval of the first ever OTC birth control pill.

title: Mommy blogger Heather Armstrong, known as Dooce to fans, dead at 47
description: The pioneering mommy blogger Heather Armstrong, known as Dooce to fans, has died at home in Salt Lake City

title: Teen hiker rescued from chest-deep snow in Glacier National Park
description: Matthew Read, a missing teen hiker, was rescued after slipping and falling into chest-deep snow in mountain drainage in Montana's Glacier National Park.

title: Ex-Raider Henry Ruggs pleads guilty to driving 156 mph while drunk in fatal Las Vegas crash
description: Former Las Vegas Raiders player Henry Ruggs has admitted he drove drunk at up to 156 mph before causing a fiery crash that killed a woman in November 2021

title: 4 teens charged with murder of beloved 24-year-old police officer
description: Four teenagers, including a 16-year-old, have been charged in the murder of a beloved 24-year-old Chicago police officer, authorities announced Wednesday.

title: UK ditches post-Brexit plan to scrap thousands of EU laws by year's end
description: The U.K. government has scrapped plan to remove all remaining EU laws from British statute books by the end of this year

title: Soldier sentenced to 25 years in prison in Texas BLM protester killing
description: An Army sergeant convicted of murder in the fatal 2020 shooting of an armed Black Lives Matter protester in Austin was sentenced to 25 years in prison.

title: WATCH:  Hundreds of endangered baby seahorses released
description: Over 300 baby White's seahorses were released into Australian waters as part of a recovery project for the endangered species.

title: Report: Lawmaker, wrong-way driver both DUI in fatal crash
description: Connecticut state police say a state representative and a wrong-way driver were both over the legal limit for alcohol when they were killed in a head-on highway crash in January

title: Florida detective accused of falsifying sex crimes cases
description: A detective who has been with a South Florida sheriff’s agency for nearly 21 years is accused of falsifying information and closing out sex crimes cases without a thorough investigation

title: Price hikes cooled slightly in April, continuing monthslong slowdown
description: The fresh inflation data comes one week after the Fed imposed its latest rate hike.

title: Sudan: 25 dead in tribal fighting, as truce talks stall
description: The Sudanese Doctors' Syndicate says tribal clashes over several days killed 25 people and wounded more than 50 in southern Sudan

title: Lawmakers pave way for EU to ratify treaty protecting women
description: The European Union has taken a step closer to ratifying a landmark European treaty protecting women from violence

title: Woman survives on candy and wine after being lost in wilderness for 5 days: Police
description: A woman is lucky to be alive after she was stranded for five days in thick Australian bushland and managed to survive on some candy and a bottle of wine, police said.

title: Mother of 6-year-old who shot Virginia teacher says son has ADHD
description: Deja Taylor, the mother of a 6-year-old boy who allegedly shot his first grade teacher in January, said her son's actions can be linked to his ADHD diagnosis.

title: E. Jean Carroll talks court victory against Trump: 'I feel fantastic'
description: Advice columnist E. Jean Carroll said she feels "fantastic" one day after a jury found former President Donald Trump liable for battery and defamation.

title: Schoolboy in Tokyo stabbed in chest, suspect arrested
description: Japanese police say a schoolboy was stabbed in the chest as he stepped out of his house to go to school in a residential area of downtown Tokyo

title: A mom tells of having baby during brutal 3-month migrant journey: Reporter's notebook
description: Mildret Paz and her family left three months ago from Venezuela for their journey north to the United States.

title: George Santos could appear in court as soon as today: Sources
description: A day after Rep. George Santos was charged by federal prosecutors, the embattled congressman could make his first court appearance as soon as today, sources say.

title: 22 dead women, no names: Interpol seeks clues on cold cases
description: Germany, Belgium and the Netherlands, working with Interpol, have launched an international appeal to help identify 22 women who mostly met violent deaths

title: Why some in new poll still want Trump in 2024 even if he's criminally charged
description: "He might be a bad person, but he is a good president," one said.

title: 1st on ABC: Harris to become 1st woman to deliver West Point commencement speech
description: Vice President Kamala Harris will deliver the commencement speech at the West Point military academy this month, the first woman to do so, a White House official said.

title: 'Outsourcing' enforcement: Biden border policies rely on Mexico despite grim record
description: The Biden administration reached an immigration enforcement deal with Mexico as Title 42 neared end.

title: Report: Car bombing near Syria's Damascus wounds 5 officers
description: Syrian state media say a car bombing close to a police station near the country's capital of Damascus wounded five officers

title: 1 dead after shooting in hospital in Richmond, Virginia
description: One man is dead after being shot inside of a Richmond, Virginia, hospital early Wednesday morning. Another man, the alleged shooter, is in custody.

title: WATCH:  Passengers escape from SUV before train smashes into it
description: Three people barely escaped from an SUV after it got stuck on railroad tracks near Dallas. Authorities said no one was injured.

title: WATCH:  Woman survives 5 days in Australian bush with just wine and lollipops
description: A woman in Australia said she survived five days in the wilderness on the only things she had in her car: wine and lollipops.

title: Georgia's championship team declines White House invitation
description: Georgia’s national championship football team is declining an invitation to visit the White House

title: Tunisia: 3 killed, 10 injured in attack near synagogue
description: The Tunisian Interior Ministry says a naval guard shot and killed a colleague and two civilians near a synagogue on the Tunisian island of Djerba during an annual Jewish pilgrimage
